Here are a selection of documents related to 231 Coyle Road: _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_a href=_Q_docs/ProjectDescription.pdf_Q__RIGHT_Project Description_LEFT_/a_RIGHT_ _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_a href=_Q_docs/9-03-10-HOUSE.pdf_Q__RIGHT_House Plans (Updated 9/3)_LEFT_/a_RIGHT_ _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_a href=_Q_docs/9-03-10-ADU.pdf_Q__RIGHT_ADU Plans (Updated 9/3)_LEFT_/a_RIGHT_ _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_a href=_Q_docs/EngineeringCalcs.pdf_Q__RIGHT_Engineering Calcs_LEFT_/a_RIGHT_ _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_a href=_Q_docs/ScheduleNotes.xls_Q__RIGHT_Schedule Notes_LEFT_/a_RIGHT_ _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_a href=_Q_docs/WindowDoorTrimExample.pdf_Q__RIGHT_Example Window/Door Trim_LEFT_/a_RIGHT_ _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_a href=_Q_docs/LightingPlan0825.pdf_Q__RIGHT_Lighting Plan_LEFT_/a_RIGHT_ _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_
_LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ This is the septic design. The ADU design is for a sand filled, pumped system. For the house we're requesting to re-use the existing conventional, gravity feed system since we're rebuilding. All this is still 'pending' with the county. The ADU design is a .zip file of a bunch of .pdf files. _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_a href=_Q_docs/ADU-Septic-07-22-2010.zip_Q__RIGHT_ADU Septic Design_LEFT_/a_RIGHT_ _LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ _LEFT_a href=_Q_docs/12-09-09-EES.pdf_Q__RIGHT_House Existing Septic Evaluation_LEFT_/a_RIGHT_
